name: Infinity Runner (itch) (Shubham_K)
description:
A single player endless running game where the screen and the game’s character are moving continuously and scoring points as it proceeds further. The aim of the game is to reach the end of each level marked by a flag while activating/deactivating the blocks which act as obstacles/void as a part of the game-play. The player can control the jump of the character and the activation and deactivation of a block. 

Number 1 and 2:  activate and deactivate blocks

Arrow Up, W and Spacebar : Jump
